input.content:
export interface Atom {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  content: string
  category: string
  tags: string[]
  status: 'active' | 'draft' | 'archived'
  author: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
  version: number
  usageCount: number
  versions: AtomVersion[]
  changelog: ChangelogEntry[]
  usageStats: UsageStats
}

export interface AtomVersion {
  id: string
  atomId: string
  version: number
  content: string
  description: string
  createdAt: Date
  author: string
  changeType: 'major' | 'minor' | 'patch'
}

export interface ChangelogEntry {
  id: string
  atomId: string
  version: number
  type: 'create' | 'update' | 'delete' | 'tag' | 'status'
  description: string
  author: string
  timestamp: Date
  changes: {
    field: string
    oldValue: any
    newValue: any
  }[]
}

export interface UsageStats {
  totalUsage: number
  weeklyUsage: number
  monthlyUsage: number
  topProjects: string[]
  recentUsage: {
    date: Date
    project: string
    user: string
  }[]
  trendData: {
    date: string
    count: number
  }[]
}

export interface MockAPIResponse<T> {
  success: boolean
  data: T
  message?: string
  total?: number
}

export interface SearchFilters {
  category?: string
  status?: string
  tags?: string[]
  searchQuery?: string
  author?: string
  sortBy?: 'name' | 'updatedAt' | 'usageCount' | 'createdAt'
  sortOrder?: 'asc' | 'desc'
}

// contexts/ThemeContext.tsx - ä¸»é¢˜ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤æš—é»‘ï¼‰
'use client'
import React, { createContext, useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'

type Theme = 'light' | 'dark'
const ThemeContext = createContext<{ theme: Theme; toggleTheme: () => void } | undefined>(undefined)

export const useTheme = () => {
  const context = useContext(ThemeContext)
  if (!context) throw new Error('useTheme must be used within ThemeProvider')
  return context
}

export const ThemeProvider: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => {
  const [theme, setTheme] = useState<Theme>('dark') // é»˜è®¤æš—é»‘

  useEffect(() => {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') as Theme | null
    setTheme(savedTheme || 'dark')
  }, [])

  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('light', 'dark')
    document.documentElement.classList.add(theme)
  }, [theme])

  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{ theme, toggleTheme: () => setTheme(t => t === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light') }}>
      {children}
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  )
}
```

// contexts/ThemeContext.tsx - ä¸»é¢˜ç®¡ç†ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤æš—é»‘ï¼‰
'use client'
import React, { createContext, useContext, useEffect, useState } from 'react'

type Theme = 'light' | 'dark'
const ThemeContext = createContext<{ theme: Theme; toggleTheme: () => void } | undefined>(undefined)

export const useTheme = () => {
  const context = useContext(ThemeContext)
  if (!context) throw new Error('useTheme must be used within ThemeProvider')
  return context
}

export const ThemeProvider: React.FC<{ children: React.ReactNode }> = ({ children }) => {
  const [theme, setTheme] = useState<Theme>('dark') // é»˜è®¤æš—é»‘

  useEffect(() => {
    const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') as Theme | null
    setTheme(savedTheme || 'dark')
  }, [])

  useEffect(() => {
    localStorage.setItem('theme', theme)
    document.documentElement.classList.remove('light', 'dark')
    document.documentElement.classList.add(theme)
  }, [theme])

  return (
    <ThemeContext.Provider value={{ theme, toggleTheme: () => setTheme(t => t === 'light' ? 'dark' : 'light') }}>
      {children}
    </ThemeContext.Provider>
  )
}
```
